info.name: Receipt Scanner API
info.description:
API for a receipt scanning application that allows users to upload receipts,
extract transaction data, view dashboard analytics, and get spending insights.


Contact Support:
 Name: Receipt Scanner Team

request.description: Upload and scan a receipt image to extract transaction data
Retrieve all items from a specific receipt

variable.description: (Required) ID of the receipt to retrieve

request.description: Retrieve a specific receipt by ID

variable.description: (Required) ID of the receipt to update
(Required) ID of the receipt to delete

request.description: Retrieve a list of all receipts for the current user
Add a receipt manually without scanning
Retrieve summarized data for the dashboard

query.description: Time period for the trends (daily, weekly, monthly, yearly)

request.description: Retrieve spending trends over time for dashboard visualizations

query.description: Time period for the trends (daily, weekly, monthly, yearly)

request.description: Retrieve data on frequently visited merchants
